create.name: create
create.description: Create ephemeral channel (messages in this channel will be deleted after time).

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Amount of time after message gets deleted.

select.name: select
select.description: Let me split universe and select one of the options.

config.noValidChannels: This server has no valid text channels. Please create one and run `/config`!
config.defaultChannelSuccess: Successfully changed guild default channel to <#{selected}>!
config.defaultChannelError: Something went wrong when changing guild default channel.
config.footer: Change guild config any time by running /config

color.title: Custom color
color.description:
Equip yourself with a custom color role.
Select desired color using button below.
color.noColor: Please set your banner color first.
color.tooDark:
This color is too dark for a custom role color.
Please select something brighter.

colorInput.label: Desired color
colorInput.placeholder: It could be color name or hex format
colorInput.invalid: Invalid color format, it could be color name or it's hex format.

profile.notFound: This user doesn't have a profile yet.

follow.followed:
Successfully followed {tag}!
You'll now receive notifications every time he/she comes back from an ≥8 hour break.

notifications.voiceStreakDescription: <@{userId}> is on a **daily voice activity streak**!
notifications.inviteDescription: Bring your guild to another level, [invite]({invite}) or [host an instance]({repo}).

currentPageInput.label: Current page
currentPageInput.placeholder: Must be a number between 1 and {pagesCount}.
currentPageInput.invalid: Invalid number, must be a number between 1 and {pagesCount}.

perPageInput.label: Users per page
perPageInput.placeholder: Must be a number between 1 and 25.
perPageInput.invalid: Invalid number, must be a number between 1 and 25.

help.title: Help
help.description:
**Leveling System**
- Mindgame tracks your activity on servers and awards experience points.
- Each level of experience unlocks new permissions, such as access to exclusive channels or roles.

**FAQ**
help.faqAnswer1: Press the Profile button or use the Applications context menu on a selected user.
help.faqQuestion2: What is the reward for level X?
help.faqAnswer2: Each server has its own rewards for levels.
help.faqAnswer3: Experience points are calculated based on server activity. Most points are awarded for voice activity. The more you talk, the more points you receive. Additionally, you can receive points for messages, a daily reward given for the first voice activity of the day on any server, or for a significant streak of voice activities on the server.
help.footer: Use quick buttons for even faster navigation.

optionsInput.label: Options
optionsInput.placeholder:
Split your options using enter, eg:
Yes
No
optionsInput.invalid: Invalid options format, split your options using enter key.

ephemeralChannel.alreadyExists:
This channel is already an ephemeral channel.
Use </ephemeral-channel edit:1116832272021192784> instead.
ephemeralChannel.edited: Ephemeral channel has been successfully edited.
ephemeralChannel.deleted: <#{channelId}> is no longer an ephemeral channel.
ephemeralChannel.notFound: This channel is not ephemeral channel.
ephemeralChannel.limitReached:
You have reached the limit of ephemeral channels.
Please delete one of them in order to create new.

0.name: Unique Reactions
0.description: Receive message reactions from other users.

1.name: Coordinated Action
1.description: Join a voice channel right after someone else.

2.name: Suss
2.description: Spend a significant amount of time alone in a voice channel.

3.name: Streamer
3.description: Dedicate a considerable amount of time to streaming content.

4.name: Ghost
4.description: Join a voice channel while in an 'Invisible' status.

5.name: DJ
5.description: Frequently send messages to play music.

utils.userOnly: This feature can only be used by users with profile.
utils.textChannelOnly: This feature can only be used in text channels.
utils.guildOnly: This feature can only be used in guilds.
utils.ownerOnly: This feature can only be used by application owner.
utils.missingPermissions: Seems like I don't have enough permissions to function properly. Invite me again and assure that I have all desired permissions.
utils.noPermissions: You don't have permission to use this.
utils.levelRequirement:
Your level is too low.
Reach **Level {level}** and try again.

error.title: Error
error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

roles.missingPermissions: Seems like I don't have enough permissions to manage roles. It is suggested to put my role above all other roles.
